_comment: Client playbook. Baresquare works with this client to qualify Glenigan leads. Each client tells us what matters to them — document priorities, sector relevance, value thresholds, exclusion patterns, scoring. Switch clients by replacing this file.
client_description: Commercial & Industrial Lighting Solutions. LED retrofits, smart (and IoT) lighting controls, solar PV, energy management systems for commercial buildings.

HIGH.description: Documents that directly mention lighting, energy, or sustainability — core to CILS offering

MEDIUM.description: Documents that reveal project scope and decision status

LOW.description: Rarely useful for CILS qualification — skip unless nothing better

document_priorities._default_note: When a document doesn't match any HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW keyword, assign this priority. Every document on a portal is at minimum worth cataloguing. Set to LOW to catalogue everything, or SKIP to ignore unknowns.

_sector_note: Sector names MUST match Glenigan PDF sector names exactly. Check DB with: SELECT DISTINCT sector_name FROM sectors

EXCLUDED: Sewage Treatment Works Storage Tanks Water Distribution

exclusion_patterns._floodlighting_note: Floodlighting is a different technology and market. Pure floodlight/external lighting projects = REJECTED. But if a project mixes indoor construction with outdoor floodlighting, the indoor element keeps it alive.
exclusion_patterns._mobile_units_note: Anything with caravans or mobile units = REJECTED. These are not construction projects.

change_of_use.reject_when: no building work described, or facade-only changes
change_of_use.keep_when: real interior fit-out, construction, or industrial-to-leisure conversion
change_of_use._note: Change of use is NOT an automatic rejection. Reject if: caravans/mobile units, facade-only, no building work. Keep if: hotel/gym/leisure conversion with real construction. Industrial-to-leisure conversions are explicitly IN.

exclusion_patterns._sports_outdoor_note: Golf driving ranges ARE in scope. Outdoor sports facilities are only excluded when the work is purely external. Mixed projects (indoor + outdoor) stay alive — the indoor element keeps them in.

scoring._timing_note: 6-12 months is ideal — early enough to influence spec and impact this FY. 12-18 months is second priority — can influence early and build pipeline.

_existing_clients_note: Also check cils.uk under 'projects' for case study names — may yield additional matches.
outreach_context: CILS provides LED lighting retrofits and Solar installations in a way that maxes out the energy savings, usually achieving more than 90% compared to benchmark energy management systems. Frame Baresquare's analytics as helping CILS understand which projects are the best fit for their solutions.
